title: Newcastle United announce pre - season return
body_text:
Newcastle United announce pre-season return
Newcastle United have announced their return for pre-season preparations.
Very little information has come out of the club this summer, apart from the bare essentials.
With until Thursday (11 July) morning, no news on when the players were heading back.
Just the five weeks to go now until the Premier League season kicks off, if you want to be pedantic, that is 37 days until Newcastle United play Southampton.
Ahead of that a friendly at Hull in 16 days time (27 July) had been announced, followed by two games in Japan, before the usual double header weekend at St Jamesâ€™ Park a week ahead of the season kicking off.
Before then though, widely reported that Newcastle United are going for a week or so to stay at Adidasâ€™ headquarters in Herzogenaurach, the world-class facilities at the Bavarian town in Germany are among the best in the world. Other clubs from England and overseas also regularly take advantage of their partnership with Adidas.
Sky Sports amongst those who have reported that Eddie Howe and his squad will travel to the Adidas HQ for a week or so this month, with potentially one or more friendlies set to be played whilst they are there. As I say though, nothing from the club about that as yet.
Now though this Thursday morning, the club using their social media to show that the likes of Joe Willockâ€¦
